description: We all know Cody Cummings has many fans. But rarely does Cody get to meet any of them. Today is one of those rare occasions where Cody gets to not just meet a fan, but also get sucked off by him! That's where Adam Wirthmore comes in. He's been a Cody Cummings fan since the Italian stud first appeared online. After begging for a chance to meet the hunk in person, we were finally able to make his dream cum true...and that's where the fun starts.Lets just say that Adam gives Cody more than just a hand shake!Enjoy!
title: Cody's biggest fan!
